div.div:
Adds ScrollToTop component to layout
Imports and integrates ScrollToTop component in the RootLayout to improve user experience by providing an easy way to scroll back to the top of the page.
Implement code changes to enhance functionality and improve performance

Enhances student showcase page layout and functionality
Replaces title param usage with name for clarity Adds grade param to query string Displays additional icons when present Improves layout with responsive design and image integration Logs fetched data for debugging purposes

Refines student showcase search logic
Simplifies filtering logic for student showcases by removing redundant search parameters. Ensures accurate matching by school and grade, improving response precision.
Add new icons for Creative Writing section
Add new images for Creative Writing section: dragon_cave.jpg, flower_field.jpg, magic_school.jpg, magic_trip.jpg, mirror_map.jpg, teddy_bear.jpg
Refactor imports and clean up type definitions in information.ts

Replaces static text with CenteredSimple component
Imports and uses the CenteredSimple component in the Student Showcase page Updates CenteredSimple component to include images and new text
Improves UI by reusing a consistent component
Remove unused icon files: quotes.png and sparkler.png; update stars.png

Removes redundant heading from ProgramInformation component
Eliminates the static heading to streamline the user interface. The heading was deemed unnecessary given the context of the component.

Updates ImageTilesHeader content and images
Revises text content for better clarity and engagement Updates image sources to use local files instead of URLs Enhances user experience by providing more relevant information
Update ApplyToJoinCTA section padding for improved layout consistency

Updates FadedImage visibility classes
Makes FadedImage component hidden by default and visible on large screens to improve layout responsiveness.
Enhance ProgramDetails component layout and improve icon rendering

Removes SplitImage component and renames ImageTiles
Deletes the SplitImage component. Renames and refactors ImageTiles to ImageTilesHeader, updating text and structure.
No associated issue.
Refactor ProgramsPage layout to include ImageTilesHeader and streamline structure

Adds dark mode placeholder text styles and updates component usage
Enhances placeholder text visibility in dark mode across multiple forms Replaces PhotoAndList component with ApplyToJoinCTA in ProgramsPage Removes unused PhotoAndList component
Improves UI consistency and readability in dark mode
Refactor Testimonial component to PageHeaderTestimonial and update usage in StudentShowcasePage
Fix import statement and component usage for TestimonialCard in TestimonialsPage
Add TestimonialCard component for displaying user testimonials

Updates navigation links and styling
Modifies href values for navigation items to reflect new routes Updates CSS classes for improved dark mode support and styling consistency

Removes redundant breadcrumb items
Eliminates unnecessary breadcrumb items creation for the first path segment to simplify the component logic and improve code maintainability.
Updates student grades and testimonials for accuracy and relevance

Enhances DynamicButton icon hover effect handling
Updates DynamicButton to allow custom hover effects Refines default behavior for link variant icon hover Fixes inconsistent padding and animation duration

Removes unused npm scripts
Deletes 'clean' and 'rebuild' scripts to streamline package.json

Enhances staff and student showcase pages
Adds dynamic buttons for email and phone links Improves image and text formatting Includes debug logging for image URLs
Updates strong element styles in globals.css for improved text decoration

Refactors ProgramsPage component for better readability
Extracts program content logic into separate component Replaces useEffect with a cleaner function to get title Adds Suspense component with loading indicator for lazy loading
Relates to JIRA-456

Fixes type definition and imports in ProgramInformation
Adds missing type definition for onValueChange function Corrects TabsContent import to resolve dependency issue
Adds size prop to BackToTop button and updates job opening display to use h3 for role
Reorders import statements in Toggle component for consistency
Updates tailwind-merge to version 3.2.0 and modifies clean script in package.json

Refactors API response handling and context usage
Updates API endpoints to use NextResponse for JSON handling Refactors context parameter usage for improved type safety Adds category information in staff member responses
Adds new creative writing pieces to student work showcase and updates main images for existing entries
Adds dark mode support to Testimonial component styling

Reorders imports in NavBar component
Repositions DockNavigation import for consistency. Moves ThemeToggle component to correct place in the navigation menu.
Removes TestimonialCards and TestimonialSection components; updates TestimonialCard styling for consistency

Improves StudentWorkCard layout and styling
Updates image container for better aspect ratio and clipping Simplifies alt text for images Enhances text gradient with dark mode support

Updates StaffCards component for dark mode support
Reorders imports and removes unused import. Improves icon color handling to support dark mode. Fixes group-hover class removal for header text.
Adds dark mode support to ProgramCards component styling
Removes border styling from showcase item images for improved visual consistency
Improves FAQ section styling for better dark mode support

Adds dark mode styling to About Us page
Updates various elements on the About Us page to include dark mode styles, enhancing user experience in dark mode environments.
Updates package-lock.json and package.json for dependency version upgrades and adds rebuild script

Refactors parameter extraction in GET handler
Simplifies parameter destructuring in GET handler Improves readability by removing unnecessary variable assignment

Enhances UI consistency and accessibility
Incorporates `ResponsiveLogo` across various pages for branding consistency. Refines text components for improved readability and accessibility. Adjusts layout structures to ensure responsive design compatibility. Removes redundant code and unused elements for cleaner implementation. Fixes minor visual inconsistencies in components like `StudentWorkCard`.
No related issue mentioned.
